mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Telegram from Gerald McGentee to Helene Wohlgemuth

mods:name.mods:namePart: Detre Library & Archives, Heinz History Center

mods:mods.mods:abstract: A telegram from Gerald V. McGentee, executive director of the American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees, to Secretary Helene Wohlgemuth. McGentee expresses his organization's support of Polk State School and Hospital and believes that the employees of Polk should be commended and not attacked for working at Polk under State-created conditions.

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Bob Nelkin Collection of ACC-PARC Records

mods:relatedItem.mods:note: II. State School and Hospital (SSH) and Interim Care Committee Records 1972-1997
Bob Nelkin Collection of ACC-PARC Records, 1953-2000, MSS 1002 , Detre Library and Archives, Senator John Heinz History Center
